com.metreeca.gate.wrappers

Class Bearer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metreeca.gate.wrappers.Bearer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Wrapper

    public final class Bearer
extends Object
implements Wrapper
    Bearer token authenticator.

    Manages bearer token authentication protocol delegating token validation to an authentication service.

    See Also:
    The OAuth 2.0 Authorization Framework: Bearer Token Usage

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a bearer token authenticator

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bearer

        public Bearer(BiFunction<Long,String,Optional<Wrapper>> authenticator)
        Creates a bearer token authenticator
        Parameters:
        authenticator - the delegated authentication service; takes as argument a timestamp for the operation and the bearer token presented with the request; must return an optional wrapper for pre/post-processing the request on successful token validation or an empty optional otherwise
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if authenticator is null

        Wraps a handler.
        Specified by:
        wrap in interface Wrapper
        Parameters:
        handler - the handler to be wrapped
        Returns:
        the combined handler generated by wrapping this wrapper around handler
